Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren added 25 points and tied a career high with 14 rebounds, had five assists and blocked four shots
Nikola Jokic had 16 points, 13 assists and 12 rebounds for Denver
Jamal Murray had 12 points on 4-of-14 shooting
The Thunder’s bench outscored the Nuggets’ reserves 25-16
Russell Westbrook had six points on 2-of-10 shooting
Before the game, Denver players and coaches paid tribute to the late Dikembe Mutombo
In the third quarter, Chet Holmgren blocked a shot by Jokic, ran the down the court, took a pass and threw down a powerful dunk
Pre-Game Insights: Denver players and coaches paid tribute to the late Dikembe Mutombo by wearing T-shirts and showing a video tribute
Reigning NBA MVP Nikola Jokic had 16 points, 13 assists and 12 rebounds for Denver
Jamal Murray had 12 points on 4-of-14 shooting
Aaron Gordon, fresh off signing a new contract extension, added 12 points
The Thunder opened the regular season with the youngest roster in the league at an average of 24 years, 148 days
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder: Holmgren can run the floor with authority
Nuggets: The Thunder’s bench outscored the Nuggets’ reserves 25-16
Nuggets: New addition Russell Westbrook had six points on 2-of-10 shooting
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver Nuggets center Nikola Jokic (15) reaches for the ball as Oklahoma City Thunder forward Chet Holmgren (7) defends in the first half of an NBA game Thursday in Denver
Oklahoma City Thunder guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, left, drives past Denver Nuggets guard Julian Strawther, right, in the first half of an NBA game Thursday in Denver
